abstract: Luke Mogelson talks about his cover story on Afghanistan, relations between U.S. and Afghan soldiers, his own first experience with live combat and what's likely to happen in Helmand Province - the most dangerous area of Afghanistan - after we pull out.

headline.main: Behind the Cover Story: Luke Mogelson on the U.S. Endgame in Afghanistan
